Description: A blue glazed composition tile: with slightly convex outer surface and a rectangular projection on the back for attachment. This projection is pierced horizontally by a single hole, by means of which the tile could be secured on a wire.
Curator's comments: For discussion of the tiles from the Djoser pyramid, see J. P. Lauer, 'Histoire monumentale des pyramides d'Égypte' I (Cairo, 1962), 76-9; P. Lacau & J. P . Lauer, 'Pyramide à degrès’ I, 34-8. Compare the tiles from Elephantine,G. Dreyer, 'Mitteilungen der Deutschen Archäologischen Instituts Abteilung Kairo' 32 (Wiesbaden, 1976), 86, VI (b) and pl.26a-b.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Capt Edward G Spencer-Churchill
